mapper.sql: serverID, serverName, serverIP, serverPort, rmiUrl, status, recomm, wlmodel, hefu, group_id, log_db, open_time
mapper.insert: insert into app_server (serverID, serverName, serverIP, serverPort, rmiUrl, status, recomm, wlmodel, hefu, group_id, log_db, open_time ) values (#{serverid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{servername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverport,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rmiurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{recomm,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{wlmodel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{hefu,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{groupId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{logDb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

serverID,
serverName,

status,

mapper.update:
update app_server
serverName = #{servername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serverIP = #{serverip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serverPort = #{serverport,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rmiUrl = #{rmiurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
recomm = #{recomm,jdbcType=TINYINT},
wlmodel = #{wlmodel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
hefu = #{hefu,jdbcType=TINYINT},
group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=TINYINT},
log_db = #{logDb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
open_time = #{openTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where serverID = #{serverid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update app_server set serverName = #{servername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serverIP = #{serverip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serverPort = #{serverport,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rmiUrl = #{rmiurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, recomm = #{recomm,jdbcType=TINYINT}, wlmodel = #{wlmodel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, hefu = #{hefu,jdbcType=TINYINT}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, log_db = #{logDb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_time = #{openTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where serverID = #{serverid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select serverID,servername,log_db logDb from app_server order by servername
